issue.title: C++: Support other integer types in Parquet I/O
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-215](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-215). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support smaller and unsigned ints.
